commit.message:
re PR testsuite/68580 (FAIL: c-c++-common/tsan/pr65400-1.c -O0 execution test)

PR testsuite/68580
* c-c++-common/tsan/pr65400-1.c (v, q, o): Make 8-byte aligned.
